exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="bg_jpg" width="1920" height="1080"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" text="00:30" x="879" y="43" width="178" height="73" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="60"/>
	<e:Group id="frameBgGroup" height="1080" width="1920" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="ballFrame" source="ballFrame_png" y="123" x="841"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="ballBackGroup" height="1080" width="1920" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="frameGroup" height="1080" width="1920">
		<e:Image id="ballWang" source="ballWang_png" y="171" anchorOffsetY="0" rotation="0" anchorOffsetX="98" x="967"/>
		<e:Rect id="leftHitArea" height="10" width="10" x="870" y="163" fillAlpha="0"/>
		<e:Rect id="rightHitArea" y="164" fillAlpha="0" x="1065" width="10" height="10"/>
		<e:Image id="frame" source="frame_png" x="869" y="153"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="ballFrontGroup" height="1080" width="1920">
		<e:Image source="scorebg_png" x="284" y="44"/>
		<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="66" height="80" text="100" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="134" size="60" x="412" textColor="0xE79109"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="得分:" x="292" y="64" height="80" width="146" size="50" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="homebg_jpg"/>
	<e:Group id="codeGroup" height="270" width="270" x="1078" y="271"/>
	<e:Image id="ball" source="homeball_png" x="793" y="682" width="100" height="100"/>
	<e:Image id="hand" source="hand_png" x="829" y="727" width="83" height="72"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="480" height="854" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="标签" x="216" y="267"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CountDownUISkin" width="600" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="countdown_png" width="612" height="625" x="-6" y="-12"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" text="9" width="224" height="193" size="200" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="188" y="204" textColor="0x0AF1CE"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxSkin" width="400" height="200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="messageBox_png" y="18" x="13" width="376" height="210"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="网页已断开" x="27" y="21" width="343" height="152" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" multiline="true" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultPanelSkin" width="640" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="messageBox_png" y="19" width="551" height="319" x="45"/>
	<e:Label text="游戏结束" y="49" width="294" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0xF70C0C" size="50" x="173"/>
	<e:Label text="得分：" x="224" y="142" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="40"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="125" size="70" text="99" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="323" textColor="0xDC842C" width="117" height="77" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>
